title: Film-Noir | Strange Affair (1945) Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea | Colorized

sources.title: Film-Noir | Strange Affair (1945) Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea | Colorized
sources.description:
Quick on the trigger! Quick to kill! 
Flamarion, expert marksman, is entertaining people in a show which features Connie, beautiful woman and her husband Al. Flamarion and Connie fall in love and decide to get rid of the alcoholic husband.

Original title: The Great Flamarion (1945) AKA: Strange Affair

Black & White original version: https://youtu.be/UaywM8HS1n4


Director: Anthony Mann
Writers: Anne Wigton, Heinz Herald, Richard Weil
Stars: Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea
Genres:  Colorized, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Mystery, Romance, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:55 Murder investigation unfolds during a theater performance, revealing secrets and suspects.
10:56 Drama unfolds as characters navigate through a web of deception and betrayal in a colorized film-noir.
17:04 Mysterious events unfold as characters navigate through complex relationships and hidden motives.
22:10 A mysterious love affair unfolds between Flamarion and Alma, leading to unexpected consequences.
26:58 A tale of love, deception, and danger unfolds as relationships are tested in the midst of alcohol abuse and dreams of a better life.
32:09 A dramatic conversation between characters revealing hidden motives and strained relationships.
37:14 A complex relationship unfolds between characters leading to potential betrayal and consequences.
41:45 A mysterious and tense film noir unfolds as characters navigate through complex relationships and impending danger.
51:37 A mysterious encounter leads to a fateful decision between two lovers in a film noir setting.
59:13 Mystery unfolds as Brandt searches for Connie, encountering dead ends and new leads in his investigation.
1:09:35 A summary of a classic film noir involving a mysterious affair and its consequences.
